licence_overview: To carry out coal mining operations, including exploration and operating opencast or underground mines, you need a licence from the [Coal Authority](http://coal.decc.gov.uk/ "Coal Authority"){:rel="external"} in England, Scotland and Wales or the [Department of Enterprise, Trade and Investment (DETI)](http://www.detini.gov.uk/ "Department of Enterprise, Trade and Investment"){:rel="external"} in Northern Ireland.
licence_short_description: You need a licence to carry out coal mining operations (including exploration) in the UK.
overview: You need a licence to carry out coal mining operations in the UK
title: Coal mining and exploration licence
